full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 57 of 262 1762
LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct
1 Q. Have you been arrested before?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. Were you arrested in Louisiana in 2015?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. What were you arrested for?
6 A. Possession of methamphetamine.
7 Q. Did you plead guilty to a felony based on your possession of methamphetamine?
8 A. Yes, ma'am.
9 Q. Were you arrested in Florida in 2017?
10 A. I was.
11 Q. What were you arrested for?
12 A. Convicted felon with a firearm.
13 Q. What happened?
14 A. I did three years in prison.
15 Q. Did you plead guilty to having a gun after being convicted of a felony?
16 A. Yes, ma'am.
17 Q. When were you released from prison?
18 A. August 2020.
19 Q. Have you been arrested since then?
20 A. No, ma'am.
21 Q. What type of work do you do now?
22 A. I'm a salesman.
23 Q. How often do you communicate with Carolyn now?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018919
